person.name: Your Name
person.title: Data Analyst
person.summary: I turn messy data into clear insights. I specialize in SQL, Python, and BI tools to build dashboards, automate analyses, and drive measurable impact.

impacts: Built SQL pipelines cutting dashboard refresh time by 65%
Designed A/B experiments increasing signup conversion by 8.4%
Automated reporting saved ~12 hrs/week across teams
Created Tableau scorecards for 5 regions with real-time KPIs
Forecast model improved inventory turns by 11%

projects.title: Product Analytics Dashboard
projects.problem: Leadership lacked a single source of truth for product KPIs.
projects.approach: Modeled events in SQL, built dbt transformations, and shipped a dashboard.
projects.impact: Reduced weekly KPI prep from 6 hours to 10 minutes.

projects.title: A/B Test: Onboarding Flow
projects.approach: Implemented experiment and analyzed results in Python and SQL.

projects.title: ETL Pipeline Modernization
projects.problem: Legacy scripts were brittle and slow.
projects.approach: Refactored jobs, standardized schemas, and added monitoring.
projects.impact: Cut failures by 90% and runtime by 40%.

testimonials.quote: Consistently delivers actionable insights with speed and clarity.
testimonials.author: Jane Manager
